fr.sii.ogham.testing.util.port

Class DefaultPortFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.testing.util.port.DefaultPortFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortFinder

    public class DefaultPortFinder
extends Object
implements PortFinder
    Default implementation that search for ports by delegating port availability check to a function.

      • DefaultPortFinder

                         IntPredicate isPortAvailable,
                         Random random)
        Initialize with a function to check if a port is available or not.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the protocol
        isPortAvailable - Determine if the specified port for this SocketType is currently available on localhost.
        random - the random implementation to use

    • Method Detail

      • findAvailablePort

        public int findAvailablePort(int minPort,
                             int maxPort)
        Find an available port for this SocketType, randomly selected from the range [minPort, maxPort].
        Specified by:
        findAvailablePort in interface PortFinder
        Parameters:
        minPort - the minimum port number
        maxPort - the maximum port number
        Returns:
        an available port number for this socket type
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no available port could be found

      • findAvailablePorts

        public SortedSet<Integer> findAvailablePorts(int numRequested,
                                             int minPort,
                                             int maxPort)
        Find the requested number of available ports for this SocketType, each randomly selected from the range [minPort, maxPort].
        Specified by:
        findAvailablePorts in interface PortFinder
        Parameters:
        numRequested - the number of available ports to find
        minPort - the minimum port number
        maxPort - the maximum port number
        Returns:
        a sorted set of available port numbers for this socket type
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the requested number of available ports could not be found
